artist: Artist: Bri; Publisher: Bri , Warren, Oh.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, graffiti reading "This World Is Broken" and a figure areillustrated in the blue, negative space against a black, xeroxed ground. The figure is sitting on a patchwork ball, and there is typewritter font text along the bottom; 20 pp.
title: The World Is Broken #2
